Html:
Hi Mike.

I'm a developer liv'in korea.

I had worked at Webcam manufacture company before .

The video Tecnologies like AR, Directshow etc.  have some difficult thing for general programmer.

At this view, Touchless SDK is nice, cool, interesting!! Thank you for your effort!

And i have a question.

The main Article 'Microsoft's Project Natal and Sony's motion controller'  used the Touchless sdk?

 

Thank you.

Thanks for the kind words. No, Touchless SDK was not used in either of those projects.

Sorry for the confusion, I'll revise the homepage comment. Check out my comment here:

http://touchless.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=58349

- Mike
